channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15630] add operation handle before operation.run instead of after operation.run
item.description: Add operation handle before operation.run instead of after operation.run. So when session is closed, all the running operations from operation.run can also be closed.
item.summary: add operation handle before operation.run instead of after operation.run

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12848177 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
For async operation, this change should be fine. However, for sync operation, with this change, if a query takes some time, could it be killed due to time-out?

jxiang thanks for the review, yes, It could be killed if session is timeout or session is closed. but I think it is a correct behavior, If the session is timeout or the session is closed, all the operations which belong to the session should also be closed/canceled/killed.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12862244 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Thanks Zhihai for the patch. Pushed to the master branch.

jxiang, pushing to master means this will be in release 3.0.0, not 2.2.0.

If you want the patch to be in release 2.2.0, you should commit it to branch-2.2. And for release 2.3.0, commit it to branch-2.3.

Please correct the fix version. Thank you.
Thanks for the version fix, Zhihai Xu.
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
